channel.title: Need help with battlescape source!
channel.description: on battlescape blitz sometimes just out of no where your account logs out, and if u try to log in it just keeps saying "username" has logged in, but u keep getting dced like 1 time per second, how do i fix this annoying glitch please help!

item.title: Need help with battlescape source!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Im not sure, it happens to me alot, just try to restart your server

I’m trying to fix this problem right now as we speak, if i find out what it is (almost found out what it was, something with calling the packets and processing them thro the players)

Then ill tell you how to solve this

but for now im not sure what to do
